short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to stream your desktop into meetings GoSession Audio, Video Conference Calls for E-Learning purpose.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension allows you (Tutors/Presenter) to share your desktop Screen to the other party (Student/attendee) of a Video Conference Call using WebRTC latest technology.
